verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> that <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1320>teachers:<s%> <S%G5037><s%> <S%G921>Barnabas,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4826>Simeon<s%> who was <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G3526>Niger,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3066>Lucius<s%> of <S%G2956>Cyrene,<s%> <S%G5037><s%> <S%G3127>Manaen<s%> the foster brother <S%G4939>of<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> the <S%G5076>tetrarch,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G4569>Saul.<s%>

<S%G1161>As<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G3008>served<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3522>fasted,<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G873>"Separate<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4569>Saul<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> to which I have <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G5037>them.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then,<s%> when they had <S%G3522>fasted<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2007>laid<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> on <S%G846>them,<s%> they <S%G630>sent<s%> them <S%G630>away.<s%>

<S%G3303>So,<s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3778><s%> being sent <S%G1599>out<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G3778>they<s%> went <S%G2718>down<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4581>Seleucia.<s%> From <S%G1564>there<s%> they <S%G636>sailed<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2954>Cyprus.<s%>

<S%G2532>When<s%> they <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G4529>Salamis,<s%> they <S%G2605>proclaimed<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2453>Jewish<s%> <S%G4864>synagogues.<s%> <S%G1161>They<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> as their <S%G5257>attendant.<s%>

<S%G1161>When<s%> they had gone <S%G1330>through<s%> the <S%G3520>island<s%> <S%G891>to<s%> <S%G3974>Paphos,<s%> they <S%G2147>found<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3097>sorcerer,<s%> a false <S%G5578>prophet,<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> was Bar <S%G919>Jesus,<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G446>proconsul,<s%> <S%G4588>Sergius<s%> <S%G3972>Paulus,<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> of <S%G4908>understanding.<s%> This <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G4341>summoned<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4569>Saul,<s%> and <S%G1934>sought<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1681>Elymas<s%> the <S%G3097>sorcerer<s%> <S%G1063>(for<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3177>is<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> by <S%G3177>interpretation<s%>) <S%G436>withstood<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> to turn <S%G1294>aside<s%> the <S%G446>proconsul<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4569>Saul,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> is <S%G2532>also<s%> called <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> filled <S%G4130>with<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> fastened his <S%G816>eyes<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G2532>him,<s%>

and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G4134>"Full<s%> <S%G5599>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1388>deceit<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4468>cunning,<s%> you <S%G5207>son<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil,<s%> you <S%G2190>enemy<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> will <S%G3973>you<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3973>cease<s%> to <S%G1294>pervert<s%> the <S%G2117>right<s%> <S%G3598>ways<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord?<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3568>Now,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G4571>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> you will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G5185>blind,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G991>seeing<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%> <S%G891>for<s%> a <S%G2540>season!<s%>" <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3916>Immediately<s%> a <S%G887>mist<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G1968>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G2532>He<s%> went <S%G4013>around<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> someone to lead him by the <S%G5497>hand.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G446>proconsul,<s%> when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> what was <S%G1096>done,<s%> <S%G4100>believed,<s%> being <S%G1605>astonished<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G1322>teaching<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and his <S%G4012>company<s%> set <S%G321>sail<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3974>Paphos,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4011>Perga<s%> in <S%G3828>Pamphylia.<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G672>departed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> and <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G846>they,<s%> passing <S%G1330>on<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G4011>Perga,<s%> <S%G3854>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%> of <S%G4099>Pisidia.<s%> <S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> on the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> and sat <S%G2523>down.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G3326>After<s%> the <S%G320>reading<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> the rulers of the <S%G752>synagogue<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G435><s%> <S%G80>"Brothers,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G2076>have<s%> any <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G1722>exhortation<s%> <S%G5213><s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> the <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G3004>speak.<s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> stood <S%G450>up,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> beckoning <S%G2678>with<s%> his <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G435>"Men<s%> of <S%G2475>Israel,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> you who <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G191>listen.<s%>

The <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2474><s%> <S%G1586>chose<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5312>exalted<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G1722>when<s%> they stayed as <S%G3940>aliens<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> an <S%G5308>uplifted<s%> <S%G1023>arm,<s%> <S%G1806>he<s%> led <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of <S%G846>it.<s%>
<S%G2532>For<s%> a <S%G5550>period<s%> of <S%G5613>about<s%> forty <S%G5063>years<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> put up <S%G5159>with<s%> them <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness.<s%>

<S%G2532>When<s%> he had <S%G2507>destroyed<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G5477>Canaan,<s%> he <S%G2624>gave<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1093>land<s%> for an <S%G2624>inheritance,<s%> for about four <S%G5071>hundred<s%> <S%G4004>fifty<s%> <S%G2094>years.<s%>
<S%G3326>After<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> he <S%G1325>gave<s%> them <S%G2923>judges<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G4545>Samuel<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet.<s%>

<S%G2547>Afterward<s%> they <S%G154>asked<s%> for a <S%G935>king,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4549>Saul<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2797>Kish,<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G958>Benjamin,<s%> for <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2094>years.<s%>

<S%G2532>When<s%> he had <S%G3179>removed<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> he raised <S%G1453>up<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> to <S%G1519>be<s%> their <S%G935>king,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3140>testified,<s%> <S%G2036><s%> <S%G2147><s%> 'I have found <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> son of <S%G2421>Jesse,<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> will <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2307>will.<s%>'

<S%G575>From<s%> this <S%G5127>man<s%>'s <S%G4690>seed,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1453>has<s%> <S%G1453>brought<s%> <S%G4990>salvation<s%> <S%G4990><s%> to <S%G2474>Israel<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> his <S%G1860>promise,<s%>

<S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G4383><s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1529>coming,<s%> <S%G4296>when<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> had first <S%G4296>preached<s%> the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G3956>to<s%> <S%G2992><s%> <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>As<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> was <S%G4137>fulfilling<s%> his <S%G1408>course,<s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101><s%> 'What do you suppose <S%G5282>that<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G1511>am?<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G235>he.<s%> But <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G2064>one<s%> comes <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%> the <S%G5266>sandals<s%> <S%G4228>of<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> to <S%G3089>untie.<s%>'

<S%G435><s%> <S%G80>Brothers,<s%> <S%G435>children<s%> of the <S%G1085>stock<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> who <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G649>is<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> out to <S%G5213>you.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> those who <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G758>rulers,<s%> because they <S%G50>didn't<s%> <S%G50>know<s%> <S%G5126>him,<s%> nor <S%G2532>the<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2596><s%> <S%G4521>Sabbath,<s%> <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> them by condemning <S%G2919>him.<s%>
<S%G2532>Though<s%> they <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G156>cause<s%> for <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G154>they<s%> still asked <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> to have <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G337>killed.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>When<s%> they had <S%G5055>fulfilled<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> things that were <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> they <S%G2507>took<s%> him <S%G2507>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3586>tree,<s%> and <S%G5087>laid<s%> him <S%G1519>in<s%> a <S%G3419>tomb.<s%>
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%>

<S%G3739>and<s%> he was <S%G3700>seen<s%> for <S%G4119>many<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> by those who came up <S%G4872>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G1909>people.<s%>
<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2249>We<s%> <S%G2097>bring<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> good <S%G2097>news<s%> of the <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G3962>fathers,<s%>

that <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1603>fulfilled<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> to <S%G2254>us,<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5043>children,<s%> in that he raised <S%G450>up<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%> <S%G450><s%> <S%G5613>As<s%> it <S%G1125>is<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G5568>psalm,<s%> <S%G4771><s%> 'You <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5207>Son.<s%> <S%G4594>Today<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1080>have<s%> <S%G1080>become<s%> your <S%G1080>father.<s%>'

<S%G1161><s%> "Concerning <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G450>raised<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G450>up<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> now no <S%G3371>more<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5290>return<s%> <S%G3195>to<s%> <S%G1312>corruption,<s%> he has <S%G2046>spoken<s%> <S%G3754>thus:<s%> <S%G1325><s%> 'I will give <S%G5213>you<s%> the holy and <S%G4103>sure<s%> <S%G3741>blessings<s%> of <S%G1138>David.<s%>'

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> he <S%G3004>says<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G1325>psalm,<s%> 'You will <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1325>allow<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> Holy <S%G3741>One<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G1312>decay.<s%>'

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1138>David,<s%> after he had in his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> <S%G5256>served<s%> the <S%G1012>counsel<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> fell <S%G2837>asleep,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G4369>laid<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3303>decay.<s%>
<S%G1161>But<s%> he <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> raised <S%G1453>up<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1312>decay.<s%>

Be <S%G2077>it<s%> <S%G1110>known<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G435><s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> this <S%G435>man<s%> is <S%G2605>proclaimed<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G859>remission<s%> of <S%G266>sins,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G5129>him<s%> everyone who <S%G4100>believes<s%> is <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> from <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses.<s%>
